page.title: 04 My Day (3)
page.content:
11.00 am We were told to go to Mr Morgan. We went and talked ,about the Domesday Project. We had to compare our work with children in the same group as us in another class. When we had finished we went to art.
12.00 am It was 12.00 now so there was not much time left, but we still did some work. I did my weaving. I went wrong so I had to unpick it. When I had got it right again there was only ten minutes left so I got on quickly. When the bell rang it was time for lunch. I had cheese and tomato sandwiches with a Mars bar and an apple. Then I went outside and talked to Lucy, Lizzy and Amy. Then we played marbles.
